Interface FileService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LanguageFileService
public interface FileService

This interface exposes the logic to get the info from the file classes

Method Detail

readFile

LOCFileStructure readFile(java.lang.String projectPath)
                          throws FileServiceException
This method exposes the logic to read the file and generate a loc file structure

Parameters:
projectPath - for the given project
Returns:
LOCFileStructure with the files and loc info
Throws:
FileServiceException - when an error reading the file is thrown
